short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Summarize and Chat with Any Website and YouTube Videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your browsing with Web-X, the ultimate Chrome extension! Quickly summarize and chat with any website or YouTube video, making your online experience more efficient and engaging. Enjoy features like instant summaries, interactive chat, and a user-friendly interface, perfect for research, studying, or casual browsing. Unlock a smarter way to surf the web with Web X.

Features:

-Summarize Button: Instantly get concise overviews of web pages and videos.
-chat layout: Engage in meaningful discussions about the content you explore.
-Instant Summaries: Get concise overviews of web pages and videos.
-Interactive Chat: Engage in meaningful discussions about the content you explore.
-User Friendly Interface: Enjoy a seamless and intuitive experience.
-Versatile Use: Perfect for research, studying, or casual browsing.
